page.title: 04Transport(Mousehole/Lamorna)
page.content: A lot of people that live in {Mousehole}work in Penzance and they need{transport}to get there. Many of these people use the bus sevice,also some people use their car to get to work. {Mousehole}is a small country village, this is why people need their own{transport.}The roads in the {Mousehole}area are very narrow and it is difficult for two cars to pass. It is much easier to cycle through {Mousehole}because a lot of people walk through the village. There are some steep hills in {Mousehole}and{Lamorna,}this is because both places are on the coast and as you go inland the land rises steeply . In some places there are farms, and you may find it difficult to find passing place to pass a tractor or a milk tanker etc.
